CreateDiscoverer.name: CreateDiscoverer
CreateDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to create an event schema discoverer. Once created, your events will be automatically map into corresponding schema documents

CreateRegistry.name: CreateRegistry
CreateRegistry.description: Grants permission to create a new schema registry in your account

CreateSchema.name: CreateSchema
CreateSchema.description: Grants permission to create a new schema in your account

DeleteDiscoverer.name: DeleteDiscoverer
DeleteDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to delete discoverer in your account

DeleteRegistry.name: DeleteRegistry
DeleteRegistry.description: Grants permission to delete an existing registry in your account

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the resource-based policy attached to a given registry

DeleteSchema.name: DeleteSchema
DeleteSchema.description: Grants permission to delete an existing schema in your account

DeleteSchemaVersion.name: DeleteSchemaVersion
DeleteSchemaVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a specific version of schema in your account

DescribeCodeBinding.name: DescribeCodeBinding
DescribeCodeBinding.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for generated code for specific schema in your account

DescribeDiscoverer.name: DescribeDiscoverer
DescribeDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to retrieve discoverer metadata in your account

DescribeRegistry.name: DescribeRegistry
DescribeRegistry.description: Grants permission to describe an existing registry metadata in your account

DescribeSchema.name: DescribeSchema
DescribeSchema.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing schema in your account

ExportSchema.name: ExportSchema
ExportSchema.description: Grants permission to export the AWS registry or discovered schemas in OpenAPI 3 format to JSONSchema format

GetCodeBindingSource.name: GetCodeBindingSource
GetCodeBindingSource.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for generated code for specific schema in your account

GetDiscoveredSchema.name: GetDiscoveredSchema
GetDiscoveredSchema.description: Grants permission to retrieve a schema for the provided list of sample events

GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
GetResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the resource-based policy attached to a given registry

ListDiscoverers.name: ListDiscoverers
ListDiscoverers.description: Grants permission to list all discoverers in your account

ListRegistries.name: ListRegistries
ListRegistries.description: Grants permission to list all registries in your account

ListSchemaVersions.name: ListSchemaVersions
ListSchemaVersions.description: Grants permission to list all versions of a schema

ListSchemas.name: ListSchemas
ListSchemas.description: Grants permission to list all schemas

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tags for a resource

PutCodeBinding.name: PutCodeBinding
PutCodeBinding.description: Grants permission to generate code for specific schema in your account

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource-based policy to a given registry

SearchSchemas.name: SearchSchemas
SearchSchemas.description: Grants permission to search schemas based on specified keywords in your account

StartDiscoverer.name: StartDiscoverer
StartDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to start the specified discoverer. Once started the discoverer will automatically register schemas for published events to configured source in your account

StopDiscoverer.name: StopDiscoverer
StopDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to stop the specified discoverer. Once stopped the discoverer will no longer register schemas for published events to configured source in your account

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource

UpdateDiscoverer.name: UpdateDiscoverer
UpdateDiscoverer.description: Grants permission to update an existing discoverer in your account

UpdateRegistry.name: UpdateRegistry
UpdateRegistry.description: Grants permission to update an existing registry metadata in your account

UpdateSchema.name: UpdateSchema
UpdateSchema.description: Grants permission to update an existing schema in your account
